mapper.sql: id, distance, duration, longitude, latitude, next_stop_code, next_stop_index, next_stop_name, stop_index, stop_num, state, route_code, stop_code_refer, stop_name_refer, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: replace into route_bus (distance, duration, longitude, latitude, next_stop_code, next_stop_index, next_stop_name, stop_index, stop_num, state, route_code, stop_code_refer, stop_name_refer) values (#{distance}, #{duration}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{nextStopCode}, #{nextStopIndex}, #{nextStopName}, #{stopIndex}, #{stopNum}, #{state}, #{routeCode}, #{stopCodeRefer}, #{stopNameRefer})
